column1: Lytkarino Optical Glass Plant (Russian: Лыткаринский завод оптического стекла) is a company based in Lytkarino
column2: Russia and established in 1934. It is part of the Shvabe Holding of the state-owned Rostec corporation.The Lytkarino Optical Glass Plant is a major producer of optical glass and precision optical instruments for the military as well as for the civilian market
column3: producing night vision devices and glass laser optics.
